name: Asteroids Mining Company
description:
Asteroids mining company takes inspiration from the classic game 'Asteroids' and mixes it together with the factory building genre.

Create stations which will defend themselves from the endless drift of asteroids and give you more resources.

Every tile can be automated to the point where your stations can harvest much more than you ever could otherwise.

---Controls---

Right click swaps between build mode and normal mode

(Tab) in build mode opens and closes the menu

MMB manually extracts or injects resources to tiles

LMB shoots/places tiles

Any other controls are explained in the game's menu
